extendedInfo.description: *New Android App* Maximize weight loss & gain muscle at the same time with the magic of the Bodybuilding Diet used by successful bodybuilders, fitness models, figure, and bikini athletes worldwide.  - what to eat for every meal broken into carbs, protein,and fat- when to eat (suppress hunger by knowing exactly when to eat each meal) - zone specific cardio plan for maximum fat-burning- weight training workouts using 99 different exercises planned out for each day you train- exact serving size calculated for each food to meet your carb, fat, and protein goals (e.g. 30g protein=4oz chicken)- measurements (oz, grams, lbs, cups) for foods cooked or uncooked- journals and saves every meal accessible & synced with all devices- share your fitness goals and progress online community via facebook- Benefits of Pro Version versus Lite Version of Bodybuilding Diet App -1)  Weight Lifting Muscle Splits, Rep Ranges, and Exercises.These muscle splits change each week (next week on Mon could be Chest & Abs for 4-8 reps) and even change more frequently as you get closer to your goal/competition date.  There are a total of 99 different exercises pre-selected for you for each workout.2)  Cardio Duration and Zone.Instead of just saying âcardioâ, for example the App will tell you 25min in Zone 1, 2 or 3.  This Zone is your target heart rate beats per minute of your cardio.  This constantly changes depending on your goal, weeks out from your goal as your cardio time will increase.  Also, the time and intensity ramps up as you get closer to your goal.  This feature will help you lose fat faster.3)  No Ads.The Bodybuilding Diet App takes the guesswork out of managing a diet to help you achieve your fitness goals!  Anyone who has a champion physique will tell you the same thing, âitâs 90% diet, 10% working outâ.  - The Bodybuilding Diet App is developed with a Pro Natural Bodybuilder & Pro Natural Figure athlete.- This App will take your through the steps of managing your Bodybuilding Diet.  **In addition** there is a fully supported website: www.BodybuildingDietApp.com which has additional FAQs and info to help you reach your goal!Please give the app a rating and send us any comments to improve it.  Thank you!keywords:  www.BodybuildingDietApp.com, bodybuilding.com

reviews.title: Good one, some suggestions
reviews.comment: Hopefully the user could set the number of meals per day instead of the default ones. Also an option to calculate at once the total amounts of selected foods for the day, so that user can prepare them in the morning or a day in advance.
reviews.author: Ed P

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: this is a great app! I wish I could track my calories progress throughout the day, and maybe even set alarms for my eating times

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Really good app would be made better if the food was more detailed like what brands etc.
reviews.author: Andrew Mckenna

reviews.title: Very user friendly app
reviews.comment: Excellent feedback from developer to my questions
reviews.author: Gabriel Garcia

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Maybe be able to change the rest days to preference and also maybe another option to just type in how many grammes of protein, carbs and fats the person requires and then the app could suggest meal frequency, types and amounts and so on. The app only seems to be for fat loss. Maybe add some options for bulking making it an all round perfect app. Thanks
reviews.author: Lewis Stephen

reviews.title: Highly recommended.
reviews.comment: Awesome app, by far the best one I have come across so far.
reviews.author: Efrain Rivera

reviews.title: Awesome app, but
reviews.comment: Updated review. The issue is fixed, app is great. (Though, I can\'t find option to see foo portions sizes in cups rather than ml or mg)  Dear developers, please fix the issue of constant logging in to the app, even if I didn\'t restart phone. Everytime I go to app, I have to input my login information. Why can\'t we have option to stay signed in. It\'s adding inconvenience of use. I will give 5* right after you fix it. Thank you very much.
reviews.author: Viktoriya Ershova

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Keeps shutting down and currently it wont open. Shame as the content is excellent
reviews.author: Reem EL-Malak

reviews.title: Impressive yet a bit rigid
reviews.comment: I really enjoy this app, especially when paired with a workout app such as jefit. I love how the diet changes depending on what you\'re working on that day and the meal suggestions.   What I thought could use improvement was the scheduling. You should be able to list which days you\'d like to take a break (Sunday for instance). Not everyone can be free to work out every day, especially when you have an active social life and weekends are more of a commodity
reviews.author: Lucas Hitch

reviews.title: Meet help with metric measurements.
reviews.comment: Having an issue with everything stuck in metric. Initial set upet me use standard measurements but one profile is completed it goes to metric with no way to change back and that includes meal weights as well... Any help would be appreciated.
reviews.author: Sharif Tolbert

reviews.title: Overall good app
reviews.comment: I have submitted feedback twice, and both times they have replied. One problem they fixed right away, the other wasnt so much of a problem but more of a suggestion.but still they replied. So if the pro version had a few more things like illustrations of exercises and a way to change your workout so you didnt have to do the ones they suggest. I would definitely give it a full 5 stars.
reviews.author: kort bowerman

reviews.comment: Great app but it updates all the time
reviews.author: AJ Flowers

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Finally a app that tells me what to eat and exercise.  Love it.
reviews.author: jp Tept

reviews.title: Bugs
reviews.comment: Frequently changes to the metric system and numbers seem a bit extreme. Also estimates bodyfat much too high
reviews.author: Hector Paez

reviews.title: Weight training???
reviews.comment: I love the diet portion of this app... but as far as the weight training... I already have my days I go to the gym and my routine down as far as days of the week n what I train on certain days... you should be able to adjust what workouts u do on certain days... its good for beginners but for people with a routine I dont want to switch everything ive been doing thats working to adjust to the preset this app has.. maybe keep the pre sets but create a dropdown menu to edit..
reviews.author: Kevin Stoll
